messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Another member joins the group.
messages.msgSnippet: ***I have no idea, Johanna. I do remember she came from a very large family, though. Valerie in Tacoma any relation to a postal worker named Willie Canada?
messages.messageBody:
***I have no idea, Johanna. I do remember she came from a very large family,
though.

Valerie in Tacoma

any relation to a postal worker named Willie Canada?

Johanna


Welcome Alberta Canada!

***Hmmmmm. There was a grand old black lady and civic worker here named
Alberta Canada. That was her real name, not where she was from. :)

Valerie in Tacoma (Washington)

wish
